name: COSMOS: A New Home
description:
CIIT's Astro Game Jam Submission Entry

COSMOS: A New Home is a story of a spaceman who lost his planet because all lifeforms went extinct so he set out on an expedition to the galaxy to find a habitable planet.

Their species is in need of a new planet to call home, and they are sent to scout a potential planet candidate to colonize. 

Be careful though, the galaxy can be filled with unexpected obstacles like asteroids and black holes, so manage your ship’s fuel wisely!

*Disclaimer: This game is not yet finished*

Developed by SMURF GAMES (TNI)

Hannah Mistica - Artist

Nicandro Obzunar Jr. - Game Programmer/Game Designer

Special thanks to Symon Timothy Del Valle

Controls 

W- to move upward 

S- to move downward 

A - to move left

 D- to move right 

E- to interact/scan

Spacebar - to boost spaceship's speed

Esc- to go back to the main menu

R- to restart the game
